name: Fading Light (Ludum Dare 39)
description:
Hi,

I made this for the Ludum Dare 39 Compo. Since I was working on the Cherry Jam I didn't take up the whole 48 hours, instead I only got to use four hours total! Unfortunately, the time lapse I recorded got corrupted.  :( 

BUT! The game is just fine! Give it play and tell me what you think!
